amendment.description: Amendment allows funds under the the Business and International Education programs section to include professional graduate degrees in translation and interpretation.
amendment.purpose: An amendment, printed as amendment No. 21 in the Congressional Record of April 28, 1998 to amend the Business and International Education programs to include professional graduate degrees in translation and interpretation.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Kildee amendment (A029) Agreed to by voice vote.
